instructions_to_main_agent: INSTALLATION: Run 'yarn add recharts' immediately. Charts are critical for this app.
THEME: Force Dark Mode. Do not implement a light mode toggle. The brand is 'Dark Luxury'.
FONTS: Add the Google Fonts import to 'index.css' immediately.
LAYOUT: Use the 'Control Room' grid for the dashboard. Dense data, but with breathing room (p-6 minimum).
COMPONENTS: Customize Shadcn components. Remove the default 'radius' if it makes things look too soft. Use 'rounded-xl' for cards but 'rounded-lg' for inner elements.
VISUALS: Use the 'lottery_ball' styles defined above. Do not use simple circles. Give them gradients and shadows.
DATA: When displaying stats (Hot/Cold), use the specific colors defined in 'colors.status'.
NOISE: Add the noise texture overlay to the entire app (in App.js or index.css) to give it a cinematic film grain look.
universal_guidelines: Do not use default Shadcn card styles without adding a glass effect.
Use 'sonner' for all notifications (bet saved, error, etc.).
Never use pure black (#000000) for backgrounds, use #020204 or #09090B.
